bicycle heaven Private Message Jul 4 2013 at 12:19am #

Bike Pittsburgh / bikers welcome to park in the Bicycle heaven bike shop Museum on the 4th to see the fire works.The Museum will be open all day and its a easy walk / bike ride down the north shore bike trail to see the big bang ,,,have fun be safe go U.S.A
just thinking, this goes for the july 3 for three rivers fire works at the point,,after 5;00 and no fire works in the parking lot,, thank you
Nice offer. I have to work, but cool cyclist know there is a place to park.

Just a note,free parking at Bicycle Heaven on the 4th after 5 till 11 pm. On july 13 for you bike and music fans Bicycle Heaven and Get Hip Recordings will be open, get hip with Legendary Abum cover Artist the great Cal Schenkel cover Artist on Zappa,,Captain beefheart,Tom Waits and many others –food–drink and music, meet Cal Schenkel from 6 to 9 pm Bicycle heaven open with Get Hip Recordings,,,,1800 Columbus and Preble ave north side right off of the north shore bike trail,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,bring your pen and your best album cover have fun ride safe
